bio.title: Connecting Visual, Product and UI Design
bio.description:
Liz Chang is a Product Designer with a background in graphic and visual design. She started out her career in Hong Kong as a Product Designer and completed her MFA in Graphic Design at the Academy of Art University in San Francisco.

Since then she has continued her career in San Francisco focused primarily on product and visual design, working at agencies as well as for web and mobile apps.

Currently Liz is a Product Designer at LendingClub.

education.school: University of Central England in Birmingham
Hong Kong Institute of Vocational Education
education.degree: Higher Diploma, Product Design and Technology
